name: DemonBorn
description:
I tried to remade my first - unfinished game, which files I lost, and I tried to make it as accurate to the original as possible - it meant all bugs, terrible code and free assets were present here as well. And I think I managed to do it pretty well. Oh and I also made it in 1 day. 

TLDR: Don't play this game, it's bad on purpose, if you want to play an actual game check out Tarnow Souls and my other projects.

Credits: I used Szadi art. awesome assets
